021package org.biojava.nbio.genome.util;
022
023import org.biojava.nbio.core.exceptions.CompoundNotFoundException;
024import org.biojava.nbio.core.sequence.DNASequence;
025import org.biojava.nbio.core.sequence.ProteinSequence;
026import org.biojava.nbio.core.sequence.RNASequence;
027
028public class ProteinMappingTools {
029
030        /** Converts the DNA sequence to protein sequence.
031         *
032         * @param dnaSequence the DNA sequence
033         *
034         * @return the protein sequence
035         */
036        public static ProteinSequence convertDNAtoProteinSequence(String dnaSequence) throws CompoundNotFoundException {
037                DNASequence dna = new DNASequence(dnaSequence);
038                return convertDNAtoProteinSequence(dna);
039        }
040
041        /** Converts the DNA sequence to protein sequence.
042         *
043         * @param dnaSequence the DNA sequence
044         *
045         * @return the protein sequence
046         */
047        public static ProteinSequence convertDNAtoProteinSequence(DNASequence dnaSequence) throws CompoundNotFoundException {
048                RNASequence mRNA = dnaSequence.getRNASequence();
049                return mRNA.getProteinSequence();
050        }
051}
